thread.title: QLogic to Announce Second Quarter Financial Results
thread.title_full: QLogic to Announce Second Quarter Financial Results

title: QLogic to Announce Second Quarter Financial Results
text:
QLogic to Announce Second Quarter Financial Results Teleconference Scheduled for Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015 at 2:00 p.m. PT October 02, 2015 17:00 ET | Source: QLogic Corp. 
ALISO VIEJO, Calif., Oct. 2, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- QLogic Corp. (Nasdaq: QLGC ), a leading supplier of high performance network infrastructure solutions, plans to announce its second quarter fiscal year 2016 results on Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015, after the close of the market. 
Following the announcement, QLogic will host a conference call to discuss the results at 2:00 p.m. PT (5:00 p.m. ET), during which additional information and commentary will be provided by Jean Hu, chief financial officer and acting chief executive officer. 
The conference call will be webcast live at http://ir.qlogic.com . Phone access will be available at (719) 325-2429, conference ID: 103235. 
The earnings announcement will be available on the investor relations section of the QLogic website prior to the call. A replay of the conference call will be available for 12 months at http://ir.qlogic.com . 
Follow QLogic @ twitter.com/qlogic 
QLogic â€“ the Ultimate in Performance 
QLogic (Nasdaq: QLGC ) is a global leader and technology innovator in high performance server and storage networking connectivity products. Leading OEMs and channel partners worldwide rely on QLogic for their server and storage networking solutions. For more information, visit www.qlogic.com . Media Contact Jess Page QLogic Corporation (949) 542-1455 Investor Contact Doug Naylor QLogic Corporation (949) 542-1330 Related Articles other press releases by QLogic Corp.
